column1: Cafe Ba-Ba-Reeba!////3 things keep me drooling for BabaReeba: the sangria
column2: the stuffed mushrooms and the halibut.  However a few months ago
column3: I found out that the halibut is no longer on the menu.  =(  But that's ok because so many other tapa dishes are fantastic.  Try the eggplant salad and the Spanish omelet to start.  They get the stuffed mushrooms
column7: chicken/sausage skewer...the list just keeps going.  Wash it down with some sangria and enjoy the rowdy crowd.
